#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

void cmp(int a[])
{

}

int main()
{
 int t;
 cin>>t;
 int a[t];
 for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
 {
     cin>>a[i];

 }
 int s;
 cin>>s;
 while(s--)
 {int a1,b;
     cin>>a1>>b;
     a1=a1-1;b=b-1;
     int flag=1;
     for(int j=a1+1;j<b;j++)
     {
         if(a[j]>a[a1])
            {cout<<"NO"<<endl;flag=0;
            break;}
     }
     if(flag==1)
     {
         cout<<"YES"<<endl;
     }
 }
     return 0;
}
